long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminderrr extension sends users timely reminders about important web pages they need to visit. You can add new reminders, remove existing ones, and mark them as done. It helps you stay organized, productive, and up-to-date with your browsing activities.
